alert.note: Alert for Saginaw (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 29 at 10:27AM EST until further notice by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Michigan... Cass River At Frankenmuth affecting Saginaw County. For the Cass River...including Cass City, Vassar, Frankenmuth... Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Cass River at Frankenmuth. * WHEN...Until further notice. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:45 AM EST Monday the stage was 18.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage just after midnight tonight and continue falling to 10.7 feet Monday, February 05. - Flood stage is 17.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=DTX. The next statement will be issued this evening at 1030 PM EST.
